Class CvtrUnit

java.lang.Object
CvtrUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<CvtrUnit>
public class CvtrUnit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<CvtrUnit>
The Convertator Unit maintains information about the Units field which is used for equation conversions.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    double conversionFactor
    The conversion value, which is relative to the other values in this Unit category.
    java.lang.String displayName
    The string displayed in JComboBox lists.
    int indexType
    The category index
    int indexUnit
    The unit index within the category
    java.lang.String unitAbbrev
    The abbreviation used in Equations.

  • Constructor Summary

    CvtrUnit​(java.lang.String display, java.lang.String conversion, int typeIndex, int unitIndex, java.lang.String keycodes)
    The Convertator Unit constructor validates the name then sets it and the conversion factor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int compareTo​(CvtrUnit cu)
    Compares the abbreviation of two Convertator Units for sorting.

  • Field Details

    • displayName

      public java.lang.String displayName
      The string displayed in JComboBox lists.

    • unitAbbrev

      public java.lang.String unitAbbrev
      The abbreviation used in Equations. This field is used to sort arrays of this class.

    • conversionFactor

      public double conversionFactor
      The conversion value, which is relative to the other values in this Unit category.

      public int indexType
      The category index

    • indexUnit

      The unit index within the category

  • Constructor Details

    • CvtrUnit

      public CvtrUnit​(java.lang.String display, java.lang.String conversion, int typeIndex, int unitIndex, java.lang.String keycodes) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      The Convertator Unit constructor validates the name then sets it and the conversion factor.
      Parameters:
      display - The display string of the Unit in the format 'Name (Abbreviation)'.
      conversion - The conversion value of the unit as a string.
      typeIndex - The index of the unit's Type.
      unitIndex - The unit's index in the Unit array.
      keycodes - The list of key letters and symbols that may not be used as unit abbreviations.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the display string is not properly formatted.

  • Method Details

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(CvtrUnit cu)
      Compares the abbreviation of two Convertator Units for sorting.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<CvtrUnit>
      Parameters:
      cu - The Convertator Unit to compare.
      Returns:
      int The comparison result: 0 = The Units are equal
      < 0 = This unit is less than the compared unit
      > 0 = This unit is greater than the compared unit
